summary: Poltergeists attack a family in Yorkshire during the 1974 nationwide blackouts.
cast: Kate Ashfield|Steven Waddington|Craig Parkinson|Andrea Lowe|Tasha Connor|Hannah Clifford|Gary Lewis|Martin Compston|Molly Windsor|Tony Pitts|Jo Hartley|Ross Mullan|Hester Evans|Graham Hornsby|Matt Connor|Kelsey Louise Stephenson|Karl Haynes|Martina McClements|Jim Millea|Nathan Morrisroe|Katie Lockwood|Cajun Sanderson|Morgan Connell|Peter Egan|Jacob Clarke|Nicky Bell|Emma Hewitt|Wayne Ewart|Samantha Blakely|Claire Catterson|Josie Owen|Sean Corey|Alan Brent|Andy Wilby|Doreen Robinson|Darren Lynch
title: When the Lights Went Out
